Good Judgment in Dealing With New Members.-- Hasty and inconsiderate actions result from a lack of 
                                                                           367
judgment, and lead to wrongdoing. But that which is most to be lamented is that the young converts will be hurt by this influence, and their confidence in the cause of God shaken. Let us pray that when the time shall come to act we may be ready.--Letter 16, 1907.
